```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
```

# 1.

```{r}
flights1 <- fread("../data/nycdata.csv")
```

```{r}
flights1[,c("year", "month", "day", "hour")]
```

# 2.

```{r}
flights1[(carrier == "DL" & origin == "JFK" & dest == "SEA")]
```

# 3.

```{r}
flights1[carrier == "UA" & month == 3 & air_time < 330]
```

# 4.

```{r}
flights1 |> 
  filter(
    month == 3,
    carrier == "UA",
    air_time < 330
  )
```

# 5.

Use the data.table method to add a variable called speed that is the average air speed of the plane in miles per hour.

```{r}
flights1[, c("speed") := .(distance/(air_time/60))]
flights1
```

# 6.

```{r}
flights1 |> 
  mutate(speed = distance/(air_time/60))
```

# 7.

```{r}
flights1[carrier == "UA", carrier := "UnitedAir"]
flights1
```

```{r}
flights1 |> 
  mutate(carrier = recode(carrier, "UA" = "UnitedAir"))

```
